meanings.definition: The state or quality of being near in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The nighnesses of the mountains made them seem within reach.
meanings.sent2: The nighnesses of the two houses made it easy for the neighbors to chat over the fence.
meanings.sent3: The nighnesses of the cookies to the children's hands caused a playful chase around the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The nighnesses of the storm clouds signaled an impending downpour.
meanings.sent5: The nighnesses of the finish line motivated the runners to sprint towards it.
